alert.note: Alert for Guam (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 30 at 4:54PM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CHST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...North to Central Guam * WHEN...Until 645 PM ChST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 452 PM ChST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 0.8 to 1.8 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Dededo, Tamuning, Yigo, Mangilao, Barrigada and Mongmong- Toto-Maite. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
